channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Latest Media Disinformation, CNN Falsely Accuses Trump Of Not Notifying Democrats Of Iran Strike
item.description: CNN only updated its story after the lie had already gone viral, gaining traction across social media and among cable pundits.

item.title: 'Not our role': Lawmakers cautious over Middle East peace, not ready for regime change
item.description: After U.S. strikes on Iran's nuclear program, lawmakers laud the President Donald Trump-negotiated Israel-Iran ceasefire but remain wary of Iran.

item.title: NYT Casually Admits USAID Squandered Money But Still Laments Its Closure
item.description: Around 1,000 USAID programs are still alive, and now managed through the State Department. The U.S. is still doing good internationally.

item.title: I run a $145 billion U.S. energy company. Investing in infrastructure and putting America first shouldn’t divide us
item.description: The debate over clean energy tax credits must transcend renewable energy—because much more is at stake.

item.title: What Supporters of Illegal Immigration Don’t Understand
item.description: To believe it is a problem is to assert that American citizenship means something.

item.title: Jason Isaacs earned millions from starring roles in ‘Harry Potter’ and ‘The White Lotus’—but he says he has ‘pretty much spent’ it all

item.title: How Did New York City Get Here?
item.description: In truth, the city’s political culture has been dying for some time. The mayoral race is just the most recent evidence.

item.title: 2 million people could have their salaries garnished by the government this summer over student loans
item.description: That's 800,000 more than initially forecast.

item.description: The work is unfinished, but we shouldn’t understate the significance of the ruling three years ago today.

item.title: Jasmine Crockett drops out of race for top House Oversight Committee Democrat

item.title: Solana treasury firm Upexi falls 62% after insider sales filing
item.description: Upexi is one of a slew of publicly traded firms that have stockpiled cryptocurrencies to boost their share prices.

item.title: Institutional Investors Aren’t the Villains of America’s Housing Market
item.description: Much of the recent shift away from homeownership can be attributed to increased regulation following the 2008 financial crisis.

item.title: NYC’s Democrat Mayoral Race Exemplifies The Pitfalls Of Ranked-Choice Voting
item.description: NYC's embrace of ranked-choice voting shows how the system can be utilized by radical leftists to gain power in blue enclaves.
